data.title: What they Serve is Awesome
data.text: Little shop in a strip mall, next to a Cigar Shop.  Wide selection of coffee.   I would say their menu is limited, but compared to Starbucks or Caribou it is much more varied.  Great Wraps.  Great Waffles on Sundays.  Nice ambiance

data.title: Awesome Place
data.text: They always have a wide variety of coffee drinks for anyone. Its a comfy little place and normally pretty quiet and laid back. They have fun baked goods and a nice looking food menu. It does get pretty busy and crowded on the weekends. Especially on the all you can eat waffle Sundays. The waffles are AMAZING. Again, something for everyone. I think last time we went there were literally 50 flavors to choose from. Very kid friendly with old board games to play. The only thing I would change would that there be more seating/tables.

data.title: Nice hangout spot
data.text: It is a very nice place if you just want a place to "hang" for a while and to catch your balance.  It has wi-fi in there and stations set up for plugging in the laptop for some quick online work one may have to do.  They have very good food there.  You could get a custom made waffle or a custom made salad ordered to your specifications.

data.title: Always good food
data.text: Stopped for a quick lunch with my family last week.  We placed our order & found a table.  My husband & I split a turkey Rachel (very good!), grandson had a pineapple waffle (he LOVED it!) and son had a vegetarian sandwich (he said was good).  Son & I had lattes, grandson a smoothie, husband coffee.  All was good.  We enjoy coming here when in Burnsville.

data.title: The Buzz has great grab and go coffee!
data.text: The coffee is good, the staff is great, and the service is wonderful. Great place to meet someone and be seen in the community.  It is on the list of many of the business leaders in the area.

data.title: Waffles, pastries and coffees
data.text: Located in a strip mall, this place would be easy to miss or disregard, but DON'T.  This is a hidden gem.  The people are super friendly.  Their selection of waffles is greater than I've ever seen anywhere, including an interesting choice of savory flavors, as well as sweet.  And they have some very interesting (and nummy) coffee choices as well.  Not your average chain fare.

data.title: Adorable and yummy
data.text: Great little local spot! Love their waffles and almond mocha! Great spot to connect with friends and support small business. Extra fun to pop by in the summer on the way to the farmers market across the street.

data.title: Great Waffles!
data.text: Adore this place! Has great coffee drinks and excellent food as well! Love their deals each day of the week, especially their waffle days! They are the best!

data.title: Best rachel panini
data.text:
My son, daughter-in-law, grandson, husband and I had a late lunch at the BUZZ.  It is a small coffee shop & cafe in a strip mall & it probably seats about 24 people at max but they are always busy.  And they serve great food & drinks.

Our grandson ordered a Fruity Pebble waffle & a fruit smoothie.  He devoured it in no time.  Our son & his wife each had a panini sandwich of grilled hummus & veggies.  My husband had the deli club sandwich and I had a rachel panini on ciabatta bread (turkey, sauerkraut & thousand island dressing).  That was one of the BEST rachel's I have ever had!!  I also had a white, almond mocha.  Yummy!

Looking forward to coming here again.

data.title: Stop by very frequently for coffee -- $1 Muffin Mondays!
data.text: It's not the biggest place, maybe seating for about 20. The coffee and small selection of foods are good. If you're in a hurry and see a line of people, best go elsewhere because the line doesn't move too fast, but the service is awesome.

data.title: a step above
data.text: A dear friend of mine and I have used for years The Buzz as our annual meet up place when I'm in town. It has a warm friendly feel that you won't find in a chain coffee house. There are many choices for breakfast, but this time I had a nice warm bowl of oatmeal with fruit (one of the many choices for oatmeal toppings). They seem to have many special and events that draw in the community. Art pieces created by locals hang on the wall for sale. My friend bought a pretty glass star ornament. Friendly staff, clean bathroom, plenty of parking and good food and coffee. We will return again and again.

data.title: Friendly and Coffee
data.text: Very friendly and make a great cup of coffee or smoothie!! I usely go there while I am waiting for a haircut next door. The people who work there are very friendly and I really enjoy the different types of coffee or smoothies!!.  They do have sandwiches etc, and free WiFi, and great chairs to relax.

data.title: Must stop!
data.text: Great staff! Even better food! I HIGHLY recommend the white chocolate raspberry waffle!!! They have an all you can eat special one Sunday a month... Never made it for that myself...

data.title: A Hidden Gem!
data.text: I've passed by this little area hundreds of time and have never stopped into The Buzz.  Today we went for lunch and it was absolutely delicious!  The menu is quite large and varied with their specialty being waffles.  Today's special was the Apple Crisp Waffle and it was delicious.  Our table also ordered the Baja Chicken Enchilada soup, a sandwich and a custom panini.  All were delicious and perfectly done. There is a great drink menu as well including the traditional coffee drinks, espresso drinks and even Italian Sodas.  Very good selection.  Each day has a special - today's was buy one get one cupcake.  They looked great as did all the other bakery items, but we were full.  Check out their website for the full details and menu.  It's a must if you're in the Burnsville area!

data.title: Good choice for (non-Starbucks) coffee in Burnsville
data.text:
Good place for unique coffee and excellent customer service.
Free wifi made it a nice place to work.

data.title: Great local coffee shop
data.text: Great local coffee shop with good morning treats and lunch options (salads and sandwiches).  The people are welcoming and the atmosphere is intimate and eclectic.  There's a nice nook near the entrance for medium size parties to meet with some privacy.

data.title: Reliable place for lunch
data.text: Primarily a coffee hosue but has waffles, sandwiches, and salads. I tasted a couple of sandwiches for lunch. Good, not memorable. Nice outside seating for those good weather days.

data.title: not my cup of tea
data.text: not my cup of tea, on of the servers was really rude when we asked for some cream, told us we shouldnt use cream, and she can show us the correct way to drink it, the owner appologized for her, no hard feelings, but not going back .

data.title: Awesome waffles
data.text: Love the waffles and variety of drinks offered. The staff is always very friendly and patient. They have the all you can eat waffle Sunday once a month and it's fun to go there and try new varieties.

data.title: Great coffee and waffles!
data.text: The coffee was great as was the oatmeal cookies waffle. Wide selection of both and friendly neighborhood feel.
